value.title: Combine Power BI Report Tooltips using DAX
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows you how to combine Power BI Report Tooltips using DAX. Just a little bit of DAX! This can be useful when you want to use a single report tooltip for multiple Power BI visuals.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Power BI User lookup with the gateway using Active Directory

This can be used for both Analysis Services mapping and the Kerberos SSO with DirectQuery connections.
